modal.title: Attention
modal.description: By using our services through your Google account, you understand and agree that:
modal.role1: 1 - The wallet created through your account is exclusively for use on Stake Together.
modal.role2: 2 - The code you will see now must be kept in a safe place and never, ever shared with anyone, as it is what guarantees access to your wallet. Anyone who has this code can move your balance. Store it with great care.
modal.role3: 3 - Do not transfer any financial resources to this wallet that are not for use on the platform, it was created solely and exclusively for you to use on Stake Together. Any use other than this puts you at risk of losing absolutely everything in this wallet, irretrievably.
modal.role4: 4 - We are not responsible for the use of the staketogether.org website and any of its features, in a manner other than directed above.

ethereumStaking.title: Ethereum Staking
ethereumStaking.ethereumDescription: Ethereum Staking: Secure the Network, Earn Rewards. Join the Ethereum ecosystem by staking your ETH tokens. Contribute to network security, participate in consensus, and earn passive income. Our platform provides an easy, secure, and efficient way to stake your Ethereum and generate yields from validator revenues. Start with as little as you want and access your funds anytime. Elevate your investment strategy with Ethereum staking today
ethereumStaking.highestValueWeeks: Highest Value in the Last 52 Weeks
ethereumStaking.eigenPointTooltip: When you stake, you accumulate points in the Eigen Layer protocol, which may later launch a token and you will can receive shares
ethereumStaking.togetherPoints: When you stake, you accumulate points in the Stake Together protocol, which may later launch a token and you will can receive shares
ethereumStaking.restakingDescription: ReStaking Ethereum: Enhance Your Staking Efficiency. Experience the next level of Ethereum staking with our ReStaking solution, merging Stake Together protocol and Eigen Layer technology. Amplify your Ethereum's potential by using it as collateral in the Eigen Layer, contributing to network services and earning income from diverse sources. Our platform streamlines your staking process, providing a more effective and profitable approach to secure the network and gain rewards. Dive into ReStaking with Ethereum today and start benefiting from combined yields.
ethereumStaking.btc: Bitcoin is the first successful internet money based on peer-to-peer technology where no bank or central authority is involved in the transaction and production of Bitcoin currency. It was created by an individual or anonymous group under the pseudonym Satoshi Nakamoto.
ethereumStaking.eth: Ethereum is a smart contract platform that empowers developers to build tokens and decentralized applications (DApps). ETH is the native currency of the Ethereum platform and also serves as a transaction fee for miners on the Ethereum network.
ethereumStaking.chz: Chiliz, the creator of Fan Tokens, has launched its own Layer 1 EVM compatible blockchain. Chiliz Chain will become the leading infrastructure for sports, attracting teams, fans, and developers, to build web3 products and experiences that bring fans and brands together
ethereumStaking.matic: Polygon (formerly known as Matic Network) is the first well-structured and user-friendly platform for scaling and developing Ethereum infrastructure. Its main component is the Polygon SDK, a modular and flexible framework that supports building various types of applications.
ethereumStaking.mengo-chz: Stake on the future of your team buying Flamengo Fan Token
ethereumStaking.galo-chz: Stake on the future of your team buying Atlético Mineiro Fan Token
ethereumStaking.vasco-chz: Stake on the future of your team buying Vasco da Gama Fan Token
ethereumStaking.verdao-chz: Stake on the future of your team buying Palmeiras Fan Token
ethereumStaking.spfc-chz: Stake on the future of your team buying São Paulo Fan Token
ethereumStaking.saci-chz: Stake on the future of your team buying Internacional Fan Token
ethereumStaking.bahia-chz: Stake on the future of your team buying Bahia Fan Token
ethereumStaking.flu-chz: Stake on the future of your team buying Fluminense Fan Token
ethereumStaking.arb: Arbitrum (ARB) is one of the most anticipated governance tokens in the crypto community. It is part of the main scalability project for the Ethereum network.
ethereumStaking.op: Optimism (OP) is a scalability solution specifically designed for the Ethereum network. It operates as a secondary scalability layer, more commonly known as layer 2, which aims to improve the efficiency and performance of the Ethereum network without compromising its security and decentralization.
